text: The Superior Court of the District of Columbia may issue an injunction or grant other equitable relief appropriate to ensure substantial compliance with or to enforce this subchapter on application by:
historical:

sections.text: A covered voter alleging a grievance under this subchapter; or
An election official in the District.
